topics.body:
"@EHAN":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/555bc9636368722fbe480300#post_555bc9636368722fbe480300
[bq="EHAN"]Like I said before:

Fetish thread: plain and simple, for the hardcore NSFW, as it was, where you guys post the images and stuff. Keep that there.

There's really no need for the SFW/NSFW split, as that would just cause extremes for the NSFW side. Leave it at one thread, and leave the "possible NSFW" notification so that leaves it open for the more softcore stuff (which we have basically done for as long as I can remember anyways, so it's nothing different) as opposed to the hardcore stuff that should just belong in the fetish thread anyways.

Agree or disagree? I want a legitimate civilized discussion, as much as you guys claim that you can't stand it, I think it'd be for the best for the future of the thread.[/bq]
page break

Then amendment: just have it explicitly say "softcore" and "hardcore" for the time wasting thread and the fetish thread respectively

And if there's a blurred line between softcore and hardcore it can be up to the general community in the time wasting thread to decide whether or not something should be allowed to be posted. Don't flip out like we did earlier, crying bloody murder is not at all the best way to solve this problem.
